Room.Name: Hafnia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hafnia Way, just west of the Caravan camp.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large shopping complex to the west called Waterfron Plaza. The plaza boasts an elven leather shop, a repair shop, and various other shops featuring imports from around the world. Directly to the east is a large field that belongs to the DeNail family, but has often been used as a camp for the assembly of caravans to leave the city. The shops are usually the first to buy the goods arriving from far off places. There is also a fighting academy in the Waterfront Plaza to the west.
